website_summaries.verdict: Avid followers of the New Balance 696 still get the classic feel they’ve been looking for with the re-invented, modern-meets-contemporary third-generation NB 696. This is evident with the use of perforated leather and flexible mesh in a much lighter and ventilated package. The subtle tweaks on the New Balance 696v3 provide improved shock absorption and comfort. It continues to gain traction on the hard court for an extremely budget-friendly cost.
pros: Lots of New Balance 696 v3 users think it’s one of the hard-court picks that aces in comfort
Many adore the excellent support it offers
According to a substantial number of reviewers, this footwear maintains a good grip
A bunch of wearers claim that the sole doesn’t wear out quickly
It’s a delight to many that this footgear comes light
Lots of repeat buyers like its superb composition
To a more significant sum of purchasers, this trainer is a good value for money
cons: Few testers notice that it’s quite stiff in the toe

customer_reviews.title: Good looking shoe but doesn’t fit well
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking and quality shoe I wanted to use for Pickleball. I ordered a size larger than normal (15) and tried to break them in by wearing around house. Every time I wear them to play (1-2hours) my toes are either raw or sore after each use. I kept thinking I just needed to break them in but after about 8-10 tries my toes and the toe box of shoe just isn’t giving in and have decided to give up on this shoe which was disappointing. It did give me great support and traction on Court just don’t need the sore and/or raw toes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I have to agree with other reviews mentioning these shoes give you toe pain
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seemed OK at the beginning but after using them for a couple times I realized that they do give me bad pain in my toes and I think is because no matter how tight I made them my foot would always slide forward and my toes would touch the front of the shoe. It is like it is not the perfect fit or shape of the foot. Instead I gave a try to another brand shoe which I dont need to mention here and oh man, what a difference, perfect fit of the foot and great comfort, I should have quit using the New Balance from the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Torres

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: after buying these a half size larger they are great sneakers especially for pickleball or any court sport. the bottoms give you good grip and for a player who moves on the court to follow the volley and their partner you can use all the hepl you can get when playing with very very good players.
customer_reviews.author: 64 worldsfair

customer_reviews.title: Great as usual
customer_reviews.text: I have had about 10-12 pair of these shoes over the years and they are the best for all around function. I do not wear for tennis. I used to buy cross trainers and they got heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are about 1 size too small
customer_reviews.text: For at least 6 years, I wore size 10 NB court shoes. About a year a go, I ordered the same shoe, and found out NB had resized their shoes and they were too small. Thus I became a 10.5 wide. I just ordered the same shoe size and to my disbelief, they to are too small. My feet are not growing. Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the shoes. Used for athletic activities. But the price almost doubled from the time I put it in my cart to when I ordered about 1 week later.
customer_reviews.author: mauireader

customer_reviews.title: Great Workout Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The NB 696’s are really nice shoes for indoor workouts. They are lightweight, fit to size, and are comfortable. Good support and excellent traction on hard surfaces. I highly recommend these shoes as a high quality and reasonably priced option.
customer_reviews.author: Al67

customer_reviews.title: I finally ordered 1 size larger than I normally wear
customer_reviews.text: After going through 3 returns I finally ordered this pair 1 size larger than I normally wear (9.5) and also wider than normal and they finally fit.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Mens 8.5 4E fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews that say this shoe runs small, but for me it fits as expected. And I wear a strange hard to find size 8.5 4E. Shoes are comfortable and grip well in the squash/racquetball court.
customer_reviews.author: VegasTrader

customer_reviews.title: Too Small- sizing is not correct
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but the sizing is off by a full size. do not order your regular size especially if you have a high arch.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Too early to rate
customer_reviews.text: Got the shoes. And they are good so far, but final rating will depend on they hold up. I expect them to last at least 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great court shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe seems well constructed and durable. My kids say they even look cool!. I wear a double E wide. The fit is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ostrich103

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these shoes. They came right on time are a perfect fit for my son. They look better than expected
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Hardic

customer_reviews.title: Is there no sneaker company that has a quality control program?
customer_reviews.text: There is no way that these sneakers are a U.S. 14. I have other shoes from New Balance that are good but these are ridiculously small. They are marked 14EE and there is no way in the world! Come on New Balance. Get it together!
customer_reviews.author: michael b.

customer_reviews.title: Good value , Skittle short
customer_reviews.text: Use the shoes's to play pickleball outdoors. Shoes seem to be about a quarter size too small.
customer_reviews.author: gordon curry

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: second pair I've owned , great shoe - color is maroon not red ,
customer_reviews.author: Jim Diffenderfer

customer_reviews.title: They run a little small
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I really like the style. I Oder a half size larger than I normally buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for playing tennis, only con is flimsy insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Fit a little tight, but only used shoes once.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe has great court grip, looks good, and fit's well. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Best Value.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Badminton shoes. More bang for Bucks. Love it and recommend to others .
customer_reviews.author: msjnusa

customer_reviews.title: Great court shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes, but they seemed about a half size smaller than other New Balance shoes I have.
customer_reviews.author: Pickleball Nut

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size bigger!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn NB shoes for about 20 years. I always ordered 8.5 4E (X-wide). Always plenty of room. So I read on the internet these shoes run small and narrow. I didn’t believe the reviewers. Well, they are correct. You must order 1/2 size bigger to match your current size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Changing Their Sizes?
customer_reviews.text: Nice style for Pickleball. But my husband has worn size 11 New Balance for 25 years; these are AT LEAST 1/2 size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P Quintal

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are stable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for playing Pickleball after rolling my ankles a few times while using running shoes. These are much more stable than running shoes as you'd imagine. They weren't very comfortable out of the box. They had very little arch support and thin insoles. I replaced them with a knee support insole from Dr. Scholl's and they are great now. Might want to go half a size up knowing you'll need an insole, I had already gone up due to other reviews so it worked out well.
customer_reviews.author: Doug D

customer_reviews.title: Normal 10.5 wides were too short causing toe pain
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying various New Balance shoes for years in the same size 10.5 wide. Never a problem until now. These are too short to the point my big toe is killing me. I’ve even removed the inserts to make more room with no luck. Disappointed that I’ve wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: too tight on my toes
customer_reviews.text: love the look of the shoe however the shoe crushes your toes, I even order !/2 size bigger and my toes rubs the top of the shoe,
customer_reviews.author: Tronie Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are correct that the size runs small. I ordered 1/2 size larger and the next width wider and the shoes fit perfectly. The shoes are also very light but with very good support. The low tread wear is amazing. I have tried many brands over the last two years and I wear the tread out in about 4 weeks ( I play 15 hours of Pickleball a week on hard courts). I have had these shoes about 4 weeks and there is hardly any wear. These are by far the best shoes I have found and the price is great. I just hope they keep making them.
customer_reviews.author: James Hass

customer_reviews.title: Order at least a half size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to other reviewers, I ordered my shoes a half size larger and they fit OK though the 4E width seems a little tight. I have to agree with others that the quality seems to gotten worse compared to other New balance shoes I have purchased before. The insoles felt like they partially flattened after a couple set. Replacing the original insole with a good replacement insole helped.
customer_reviews.author: 808 andy

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: They say that they are e4. Which is the width. No they are not.
customer_reviews.author: john schofield

customer_reviews.title: Keep  looking
customer_reviews.text: I am a new balance fan . Have 2 pair of the 1006 . Love them. However this shoe is fair at best. Price was great , fit ok. Just not very comfortable or flexible. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: FREDRICK

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look good and feel fine but the quality is suspect. Played in them for about a month and the stitching has already come undone on the toe. The quality of this shoe is unexpectedly bad for New Balance. I had higher expectations for the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Used my shoe stretcher for additional width and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.text: I wear AFO's on both feet and need to wear a 11 1/2 4E (XW). Shoes were just a bit to small for my usual New Balance 11 1/2 4E's but not small enough to go to a 12 4E. Used my shoe stretcher for additional width and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Size Not Correct
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering New Balance shoes from Amazon for years. Always a 7.5. Sometimes Wide, sometimes Xtra Wide, but the size always stayed the same. I got these shoes and they were a 1/2 size too small. They need to change the sizing on these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Getz

customer_reviews.title: Order half size larger
customer_reviews.text: Needed to order another pair half size larger for playing tennis. Normal size crowded the front of my foot while playing.
customer_reviews.author: Lois M

customer_reviews.title: awesome shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 pair of New Balance shoes and these are my favorites. I have to have a 1" buildup on the right shoe and I was sceptable that americanheelers could do this shoe but it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: JLSmith

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shows for pickleball and they do a good job. They are comfortable and give good grip on the hard surface. I would recommend them as a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie S

customer_reviews.title: How do I return these?
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of these and ordered them without realizing they were men's shoes. I'd like to return them, but there were no shipping papers in the package with the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Toneezsis

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe from a great shoemaker!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to play pickleball with. They fit me great and provide the traction and stability I need. I'm thinking of getting another pair just to wear casually I love them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Todd_196

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!
customer_reviews.text: Believe in everyone, it's really small. Buy 1/2 size higher or just buy an Adidas, Nike, Asics, or any other brand that know the standards. I bought a wide expecting it would work, now I have to sell it and I already bought an Adidas. I won't buy New Balance again after this poor experience.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Torres

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but about a half size small
customer_reviews.text: Like the look and feel. Supportive yet pretty slick looking. Order 1/2 size larger than normal and you'll be happy
customer_reviews.author: James V Cefaratti

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Nike's all my life. This is my first pair of New Balance and I couldn't be happier. They fit well and made are very well, also extremely comfortable. Have received many compliments! Looking for my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good but I think the run a touch small.
customer_reviews.author: LOREN E. SPITZER

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Way too narrow! Not 4e, not 2e, not even e! 3/4” narrower than my old 4E NB shoes
customer_reviews.author: RONALD R. BOOMER

customer_reviews.title: Low cut heel.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking show. Only problem I have with the shoes are the heels. The show has a very low cut heel. Your heel feels like it's coming out of the shoe when you walk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look good but it needs to be a little wider in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pickleball!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have purchased. Great for pickle ball court! Comfortable and no slips!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I like them, they are very comfortable. They look a little like old man shoes. The color distracts from the old man look a little bit. I am 55 and I don't need anything to make me look older
customer_reviews.author: J. Long

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.  Fits a little small.
customer_reviews.text: The fit was a little tight. I usually wear a 10 but could have used a 10.5. Very nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Pettus

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know the width scale for the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe, but too small in width. I need 4E rather than 2E. I bought similar New Balance in 4E and worked fine. I had to return this 2E for a refund as there were no 4E to exchange. Refund was easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: thomas e walsh

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: Great fit thick front toe rubber perfect for the concrete floors while playing nyc Handball ✅
customer_reviews.author: Felix Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Built well! A tad heavy, but not a real negative.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: NB 696v3 great price and a perfect fit - Men's Tennis Show
customer_reviews.text: Ordered wide width. Perfect fit. Price was significantly lower than tennis. Nice traction on Tennis hard court.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feels cool on the tennis court. The negative is that they are not made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps101

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have found most court shoes are running small these days. One size larger and wider fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Guitargarage

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase these the next time I need shoes
customer_reviews.text: WI will purchase these the next time I need shoes
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are comfortable and fit just right
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide foot and I ordered the EE width. These shoes are comfortable and fit just right. Would definitely choose these again.
customer_reviews.author: MJE

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: There is too much room in the toe box and not enough padding. After a couple of hours my toes were so tender I had to quiet playing. Started wearing my fresh foam and they are much better
customer_reviews.author: mike cluck

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately new balance has produced a product that does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately new balance has produced a product that does not meet their standards. Size and fit not correct. New Balance needs to reassess this product and specifications.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Blaskey

customer_reviews.title: Look at a different New Balance shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Returned as the 2e was very tight in the toe box. As per other reviews, ordered a larger size, but had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Al G.

customer_reviews.title: Need bigger size
customer_reviews.text: I liked it and wanted it but needed a 10.5 wide. But you don’t have it
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I use this sneaker for Tennis. My previous pair, size 14, fit perfect. This models size 14, is not consistent and fits tight. I hope it stretch with more play.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Nootz

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe but the size was not accurate. Ordered a 4E and 1/2 size up, but it was still tight; felt like a 2E. New Balance sizes are no longer consistent.
customer_reviews.author: MikeD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always gotten a 2E size. For some reason this is the 2nd pair that has run too small. Going to have to switch to a 4E. I kept the first pair, but I send this back.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE L SACO

customer_reviews.title: Weak material
customer_reviews.text: These shoes didn't even last a month! The side tore out.
customer_reviews.author: dafehrs09

customer_reviews.title: Tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: It is ok. It is hard in the bottom. It fits ok.
customer_reviews.author: Tony chen

customer_reviews.title: Style and fit down change which is good since my sons foot only keeps growing!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find tennis shoes. Only ones my son will wear.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: They are advertised as 4E but they are so tight ...
customer_reviews.text: They are advertised as 4E but they are so tight on the sides that my bunionettes are hurting after the first day of wearing them. I ordered a 13 first and they were way too tight so I exchanged for 14 but still not wide enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good on court performance
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and gave me the on court traction I was looking for👍
customer_reviews.author: Randal W. Limberg

customer_reviews.title: It's not a wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's not a wide shoe. Sizes are extremely small. Go somewhere and try on before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great tennis shoe, my second time buying them after 3 full seasons of tennis!
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: NOT YOUR MOTHER’S NEW BALANCE
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a NB 4E......totally not wide enough.....don’t bother ..NB has become garbage
customer_reviews.author: David Rothfeld

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable & well padded
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable & well padded. However, for use as a tennis shoe, could be a little lighter in weight. Overall, very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: D Zide

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Caused a toe blister. Not as comfortable as other New Balance tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: R.J.G.

customer_reviews.title: good shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is very good, but I changed to 10.5 4E, because my feet are too fat and wide.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: The pair should’ve posted item as irregular
customer_reviews.text: The product sneakers were not an identical match: on sneaker’s design was some what irregular in that the design of the heel was not properly designed!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M.

customer_reviews.title: under sized
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 10 but bought this in a 10.5, 2E and they are too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Rau

customer_reviews.title: Super supportive and they breath well.
customer_reviews.text: If they weren't a little small in length for me, they would be very comfortable.They're super supportive. I haven't had any ankle-roll since I started playing tennis in these on hard and clay courts. They breath well too.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Carr

customer_reviews.title: Watch the fit
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is a little short for stopping and starting
customer_reviews.author: J Richard Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Would like to exchange for a larger size . How do I proceed?
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit as expected would like to exchange for larger size. How do I proceed?
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Aukerman

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I have worn NB 9.5 4e for years. This pair was the same size however at least a half a size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Goergen

customer_reviews.title: The fit!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great fit! Also, like the colors! All around good-looking shoe for tennis!
customer_reviews.author: Dotti

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. I use it for playing tennis.
customer_reviews.author: decha sorasithi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes, well made
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes, well made, I play mostly on hard courts, but I am sure they will be fine even on clay.
customer_reviews.author: AmznCust122019

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off - runs very small
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is seriously off in this shoe. I wear a women's size 8 shoe (men's 6.5) but occasionally buy men's tennis shoes in size 7 for a little extra room. My toes were jammed against the front and top of this shoe. I tried to see if my insoles would help with the fit and the insole was almost an inch too long to fit in this shoe. It's a nice looking shoe but obviously will have to go back. I used to wear New Balance more than any other brand but the small sizing has been an issue with several styles now.
customer_reviews.author: DBAZ

customer_reviews.title: For me the coushening of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: Play Tennis. For me Balance is the best to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend it
customer_reviews.text: It tore in 2 months, near the toe and took 2 weeks to break into
customer_reviews.author: Arjun Ramachandran

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They look great but after playing tennis for an hour l found they cut my big toe.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: the toe box is way longer than any 13 i ...
customer_reviews.text: the toe box is way longer than any 13 i have worn before. I need to return them unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: benjamin e.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Feel good and comfortable right very cushiony true to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Christoper D.

customer_reviews.title: confort
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Best shoe out of the box ever. very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E Tirado

customer_reviews.title: Tennis
customer_reviews.text: Use it to play tennis very good support looks good to
customer_reviews.author: joseph l.

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: They run a size and a half small not true to size the
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered mine 1/2 size bigger than normal. And they were still a bit snug.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL POUDRIER

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight
customer_reviews.text: Long time New Balance customer. My feet are slightly wider than average, so I normally order 2E. After reading reviews of this shoe stating that customers thought shoe fit too small, I decided to order 4E. However, this shoe* is still too tight. It's almost like these aren't* even using the normal New Balance sizing standard. It makes me question whether these shoes are manufactured by New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be resized.
customer_reviews.text: No way was this a 4E. Very tight fit even at 91/2 4E. I originally ordered a 9 and it was way way too small. I finally ordered a different style NB 9E and it was fine. This shoe should be resized.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too tight for me. Never had aproblem with 4e before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4E not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 4E in a half-size up in length, as recommended in other reviews; length was good, but not even close to a 4E width in toe box. Usually get Asics, and 4E fits fine; unfortunately, can't find any Asics court shoes in 4E.
customer_reviews.author: DMA

customer_reviews.title: New balance quality... poor
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks of everyday use the perforated top is showing cracking from hole to hole. Before noticing it I bought a 2nd pair to use in conjunction with the 1st pair. I’ll see how they hold up before tossing them
customer_reviews.author: ed

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's 39s 696v3 Hard Court Running Tennis Shoes, White Red, 12 UK
